page.title: 03Recreation in Wilton
page.content: In Wilton area there is not enough sport or recreation organised. From a{survey of pupils}at{Wilton {Middle School}and of people in Wilton it was found that many people played sports. Many playing at the school which has a{gymnasium.}The gym is used by the{youth football team}for training and by the{Wilton Badminton {Club.}A few people played{squash}at the larger sports complex at Westwood {St. Thomas Upper School. Wilton needs its own public swimming pool. There is one{youth club}in Wilton and it only meets once a week on a Thursday. The public said we needed more tennis, but only 5 out of 50 said they belonged to the{tennis club. We want a better park for younger children.
